scripts.pre-release: git checkout develop; git pull; git checkout master; git pull; git merge develop; npm run build:docs; npm run build:lib; git add .; git commit -m 'feat: ğŸ“¦å‘å¸ƒç‰ˆæœ¬'; git push
scripts.branch-merge: git push --tags; git push; git checkout develop; git merge master; git push
scripts.release-patch: npm run pre-release && npm version patch -m 'tag: ç‰ˆæœ¬æ›´æ–°è‡³ %s patch' && npm publish && npm run branch-merge
scripts.release-minor: npm run pre-release && npm version minor -m 'tag: ç‰ˆæœ¬æ›´æ–°è‡³ %s minor' && npm publish && npm run branch-merge
